questions.question: HOT : COLD :: UP : ____
questions.explanation: Hot is the opposite of cold; up is the opposite of down.

questions.question: TEACHER : SCHOOL :: PILOT : ____
questions.explanation: A teacher works at a school; a pilot works at an airport.

questions.question: DAY : NIGHT :: LIGHT : ____
questions.explanation: Day is the opposite of night; light is the opposite of dark.

questions.question: DOG : PUPPY :: CAT : ____
questions.explanation: A young dog is a puppy; a young cat is a kitten.

questions.question: BIG : LARGE :: SMALL : ____
questions.explanation: Big and large are synonyms; small and tiny are synonyms.

questions.question: CAR : ROAD :: PLANE : ____
questions.explanation: Cars travel on roads; planes travel in the sky.

questions.question: WRITE : PEN :: CUT : ____
questions.explanation: A pen is used to write; scissors are used to cut.

questions.question: EAR : HEAR :: EYE : ____
questions.explanation: Ears are used to hear; eyes are used to see.

questions.question: RAIN : WET :: SUN : ____
questions.explanation: Rain makes things wet; sun makes things dry.

questions.question: SOLDIER : ARMY :: SAILOR : ____
questions.explanation: A soldier serves in an army; a sailor serves in a navy.

questions.question: FAST : QUICK :: SLOW : ____
questions.explanation: Fast and quick are synonyms; slow and sluggish are synonyms.

questions.question: BIRD : FLY :: FISH : ____
questions.explanation: Birds fly; fish swim.

questions.question: KNIFE : SHARP :: PILLOW : ____
questions.explanation: A knife is sharp; a pillow is soft.

questions.question: HAPPY : SAD :: WIN : ____
questions.explanation: Happy is the opposite of sad; win is the opposite of lose.

questions.question: PILOT : AIRPLANE :: DRIVER : ____
questions.explanation: A pilot controls an airplane; a driver controls a car.

questions.question: SHOE : FOOT :: GLOVE : ____
questions.explanation: A shoe covers a foot; a glove covers a hand.

questions.question: AUTHOR : BOOK :: COMPOSER : ____
questions.explanation: An author creates a book; a composer creates a song.

questions.question: SOLDIER : WAR :: FIREFIGHTER : ____
questions.explanation: Soldiers fight in wars; firefighters fight fires.

questions.question: DOCTOR : HOSPITAL :: MECHANIC : ____
questions.explanation: Doctors work in hospitals; mechanics work in garages.

questions.question: ICE : COLD :: STEAM : ____
questions.explanation: Ice is cold; steam is hot.

questions.question: LEADER : GUIDE :: TEACHER : ____
questions.explanation: A leader guides; a teacher instructs.

questions.question: NURSE : PATIENT :: TEACHER : ____
questions.explanation: A nurse cares for patients; a teacher teaches students.

questions.question: WING : PLANE :: TIRE : ____
questions.explanation: A wing is part of a plane; a tire is part of a car.

questions.question: PEN : WRITE :: BRUSH : ____
questions.explanation: You write with a pen; you paint with a brush.

questions.question: BOOK : LIBRARY :: PLANE : ____
questions.explanation: Books are kept in a library; planes are kept in a hangar.
